channel.title: Greatpkerz project (updated 1:01 AM)
channel.description:
[size=18pt]GREATPKERZ[/size] Greatpkerz is gonna be just like Hackscape and runescape, i was gonna make the leveling a little fast but not to fast maybe like 60xp,i was gonna put shops in varrock,fally,edge,and catherby,Greatpkerz is gonna be made with delta (lots of bugs), i am also gonna try and get all skills working so far it's attack, strength,defence,range,mage,fletching,smithing mining,crafting,and woodcutting.
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/a7eb29355201750b792f0274f86f6d0a393a62745452895fd40c8d90758981ad4g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/c0339a0f8feb63a75a52e79d630e9569a42082c80eee8d3c3744856027246ed34g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/c657bc417c7bf38954c460dbbe779c11b0e55c7d9a1e2e090d2cb72be4f695ed5g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/25572da0b1a52762cefd41176045208fa4618256100207dc59faaa960325159a5g.jpg[/img] Team: Hoster - me for now. coder - me coder 2 - open coder 3 - open
i'm gonna need a little help with this project so if you want to be a coder for me you will get to put donation buttons on the greatpkerz website and you get mod, i would say you get 30% donations but my paypal sending limit is 0 so i woulden't be able to send you the money we make that's why i'm letting people put donation buttons on the site.
Email - knueppel123@yahoo.com
Problems found: Agility is not working right Fight pits timer says 0 sometimes when no one goes in it.
UPDATES fishing is now 70% done just 2 more bugs. Fletching is now 100% done. D claws now 100% working with special. Farming is 90% shops are 45% done. runecrafting is 100%. Crafting is 100% Smithing is 100% Dragon dagger is now 70% done just need to make it poison people. God wars boss added (40% drops d claws,and 40%god sword.

item.title: Greatpkerz project (updated 1:01 AM)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Clawz fury:

ALSO, If you think that you are going to have a “Runescape Remake” with delta, you have no sense. If you want a Runescape remake, write your own base.

You could make a RuneScape remake from all bases, not 100% but still as close.

knueppel7799:

i don’t want a 100% remake of runescape i just want a server where you have to find the shops instead of just having them in one room, like hackscape,and also i don’t like fast leveling because it takes one minute to get 99 wheres the fun in that? so i just make to make as server with little xp and you can go all over the map and find shops and stuff.

That won’t take that long mate, a max of 10-15 minutes for the shops, EXP, and moving training areas and stuff.

Read full topic
